title: fabulous glimse of old world charm
review: a beautiful hotel. it has been restored and maintained tastefully. a beautiful garden and deck .  the food especially is fabulous.  it is best eaten outdoors with the sun on your back or a bbook fire  and stars above...

title: Great Heritage Hotel
review: this is a former palace converted to a cosy hotel resort.

title: Royal stay
review: Kasmanda Palace, Mussoorie is a 150 year old palace with regal interiors and luxurious ambience. It offers the perfect royality.

title: Royal hotel
review: This is an erstwhile luxurious palace converted into a Hotel on the Mall Road.

title: Simply awesome!!
review: It’s a must visit when you go to Mussorie. Also not to forget to have lunch there. Beautiful backdrop to click awesome pics.

title: An experience to remember
review: Kasmanda Palace is not just a hotel, it’s an experience of its own! The palace is a heritage place where a king used to live, the interiors has a lot of the king’s hunting sovereigns and lot of his personal belongings. It’s a big palace painted in yellow colour which beautifully goes with the Mussoorie mountains and its beauty.

title: Awesome
review: Be in its architecturre or its heritage and history this place is wonderful on all aspects and parameters

title: Beautiful Heritage Property
review: I think one of the best Heritage property in Mussoorie ,

title: colonial
review: well staying at kasmanda is surely an experience in itself...nice views of the valley...even though the trek to the hotel is a bit tiring....British era architecture...big rooms ...certainly a very nice feel....on the mall road yet away from all the hustle...

title: Distinct Old World Charm
review: a well maintained heritage structure, it possesses a great old world charm to it. The place is well kept right from the furniture to the stuffed animals on the walls. The best part is that its walls are adorned with a number of old photographs that also narrate the story about the building and its inhabitants.

title: Awesome property
review: Lovely place with courteous staff and nice place to sit out...view from the hotel is simply amazing...value for money and ideally located

title: royale
review: beautiful valley views and perfectly decorated place
